categories: Category:Imperial Army generals of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Nevar was a Brigadier General in the ground forces of the Galactic Empire's military. During the Battle of Hoth, Nevar commanded the All Terrain Armored Transport walker Blizzard 2 of Blizzard Force, under the overall direction of General Maximilian Veers. Nevar's Blizzard Two was the first Imperial walker downed by defending Rebel forces using the harpoon and tow cable of Rogue Three (Wedge Antilles and Wes Janson).
